segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and I’m amazed she hasn’t noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy on the stool is going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not even noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything around her is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor slippery, and someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to do something before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so high, and the stool is wobbling—it’s like he’s asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is the most chaotic kitchen scene I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
